cards.title: Rubio says US will 'blow up' foreign crime groups if needed
cards.summary: Marco Rubio says US will 'blow up' foreign crime groups if needed. Comments come days after US forces carried out a strike on a boat in the Caribbean Sea. The White House says it killed 11 drug-traffickers, though it did not release their identities.

cards.title: Trumpâ€™s LA national guard deployment cost taxpayers $120m, Newsom says
cards.summary: President sent 2,000 national guard troops into the city in June amid clashes between federal immigration agents and protesters. This week a judge ruled that dispatching the military to accompany authorities on immigration enforcement operations violated federal law. More than 4,200 national guard soldiers and 700 marines were deployed in the region.

cards.title: He doesn't follow trends': How celebrities described Armani over the years
cards.summary: Giorgio Armani passed away aged 91. He was the archetype of Italian style and elegance. He reimagined men's and women's suits for a modern audience.
